text: Va ʙa jod ovared ne'mati Allohro ʙar xes va [niz] pajmone, ki sumoro ʙa [ancomi] on muvazzaf gardondaast, on goh ki [dar ʙorai da'vat ʙa farmonʙardori ʙa pajomʙar] gufted: "Sunidem va itoat kardem". Va az Alloh taolo parvo kuned [ʙitarsed], [ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo ʙa on ci daruni sinahost, donost
